A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The problem is not that this is just another Hollywood "Fe-make" social justice lesson\, the problem is it's at the expense of STAR WARS LEGACY!!

Between Leia Poppins\, Ghost Yoda lightning\, and space gravity\, this one was over the top.

Plot:  (Spoilers)
White men are evil.
Women are all super heroes.
Rich people are evil.

Got it?

If you even 1/2 enjoy Star Wars\, don't give creepy Disney a dime of your money ever again.
